dcterms:creator: Antoine Louis
Gerasimos Spanakis
dcterms:description: The Belgian Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset (BSARD) consists of 1,100+ French native questions on various legal topics, labeled by skilled experts with references to relevant statutory articles from the Belgian legislation. The retrieval corpus comprises 22,600+ articles collected from 32 Belgian codes covering numerous legal domains.
dcterms:title: Belgian Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset (BSARD)
